data.title: Images by SirSchebling
data.meta_description:
#warthunder #live_wt #workshop

Bolkhovitinov DBA
During the 1930s the aircraft industry managed to develop a number of innovations which resulted in a considerable increase in performance. The new concepts included the retractable undercarriage, enclosed cockpits, new alloys, smooth stressed-skin metal construction and above all: powerful and reliable engines.
During this period the bomber played a leading role in many countries\' air-war doctrines and it was decided to find a replacement for the outdated Tupolev TB-3 strategic bomber. In 1934 a Specification was issued, calling for a heavy bomber which was to use the mentio
